Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Boredom \Bore"dom\, n. 1. The state of being bored, or pestered; a state of ennui. --Dickens. [1913 Webster]
2. The realm of bores; bores, collectively. [1913 Webster]
boredom n : the feeling of being bored by something tedious [syn: {ennui}, {tedium}]
